name: Rogue Soccer (Coldstream)
description:
Hello Fellow Indie and Punk Developers!

Rogue Soccer - my first game design experiment is a play with that persistent feeling of love/hate relationship with a round collidable object (if that makes any sense). It is very much in development as a concept and pretty far from anything resembling a finished game. Thus as expected - it is indeed quite buggy and glitchy as hell.
